title: Dennis Quaid, 65, and Laura Savoie, 26, show off beach bodies
text:
Advertisement

Dennis Quaid's romance with a PhD student more than half his age is still going strong.

The 65-year-old actor and his 26-year-old girlfriend Laura Savoie were pictured enjoying a romantic holiday in Hawaii on Friday.

The pair were spotted holding hands along the shores of Waikiki before stripping down to go paddle boarding.

Savoie put her toned physique on show in a skimpy cream bikini while the actor was keen to show off his muscles by going shirtless.

Beach fun: Dennis Quaid, 65, and Laura Savoie, 26, were spotted enjoying a holiday in Hawaii on Friday

Never mind the gap: The couple, who are 39 years apart, share a love of the ocean

Buff bodies: The blonde PhD student put her toned physique on show in a skimpy cream bikini while the actor was keen to show off his muscles by going shirtless

Savoie is studying a PhD in accounting at the University of Texas at Austin's McCombs School of Business and is expected to graduate next year.

The pair were first pictured together in May and enjoyed a romantic trip to Italy together in August.

Savoie previously dated Entourage star Jeremy Piven, 54, while she was an undergrad at LA's Pepperdine University.

Dennis was in a relationship with Santa Auzina, a 32-year-old model, prior to dating Savoie.

Riding the waves: The pair headed out for a spot of paddle boarding

The A Dog's Purpose star was married to actress P. J. Soles for five years in 1978 before getting hitched to Hollywood star Meg Ryan, with whom he has 27-year-old son Jack.

Meg is currently engaged to rocker John Mellencamp.

Dennis was then married to Kimberly Quaid, who he has 11-year-old twins Thomas and Zoe with, before the pair officially divorced last year.

A break from the books: Savoie is studying a PhD in accounting at the University of Texas at Austin's McCombs School of Business and is expected to graduate next year

Flexing those muscles: The 65-year-old looked sprightly as he carried his big board back in

The Parent Trap star previously explained that he doesn't regret any of his relationships and has learned to 'look back with fondness' at his past romances.

He said: 'Live and let live. That's really the course of things. I look back at the things I worried about ten years ago and I can't even remember what they were, really.

'After you've been apart, after relationships end. The once hot emotions mellow over the years and you forget about it. And you look back with fondness.'

So in love: Savoie, who previously dated Jeremy Piven, 54, held onto her boyfriend's hand during a stroll on the sand
description: Dennis Quaid's romance with a PhD student more than half his age is still going strong. The 65-year-old actor and Laura Savoie, 26, were pictured on holiday in Hawaii on Friday.
